Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Directs the New York City Housing Authority and the department of information technology and telecommunications of the city of New York to establish a 311 hotline to receive public housing complaints
Summary: Directs the New York City Housing Authority and the department of information technology and telecommunications of the city of New York to establish a 311 hotline to receive public housing complaints.
LawCode: Add ยง402-h, Pub Hous L; add ยง1077, NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the New York city charter, in relation to directing the New York City Housing Authority to establish a 311 hotline for the submission and receipt of complaints
